document_data.name: Joiifericus
document_data.mainbody: '''Joiifericus''' was a [[succubus]] nursemaid serving the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|42}}
document_data.Activities: Joiifericus' duty was to take care of the many half-demon children of Graz'zt in [[Maerimydra]] ''circa'' [[1486 DR]]. She would seek escape if attacked and would only fight if someone tried to abduct one of the children, but would not defend them.
